name: Procrastinator
description:
This is my product for the personal project, and it was rushed I guess. Made using RPG Maker MV.

This is my first game, and it shows. The maps are definitely bland. I think the game is very easy - unless you go for Sans - and not very good. But I may think of improving upon this product, I don't know. I will need a lot more time if I want to improve it though. 

Controls :

Z - Confirm/Interact

X - Menu/Cancel

Arrow Keys - Move
